element.name: Super
element.definition: The root of all data elements.

element.name: PersonName
element.definition: A combination of names and/or titles by which a person is known.

element.name: PersonNamePrefixText
element.definition: A title or honorific used by a person.

element.name: PersonNameSuffixText
element.definition: A term appended after the family name that qualifies the name.

element.name: PersonRaceCode
element.definition: A classification of a person based on factors such as geographical locations and genetics.

element.name: PersonSexCode
element.definition: A gender or sex of a person.

element.name: PersonSurName
element.definition: A last name or family name of a person.

element.name: PersonGivenName
element.definition: A first name of a person.
